statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_recommendation FROM patient_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC, gender DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' OR age < 25 ORDER BY diagnosis ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND treatment_recommendation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_recommendation FROM patient_data WHERE age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY patient_id ASC LIMIT 7
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND (age < 30 OR age > 60) ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC LIMIT 4
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 40
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.treatment_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, cost FROM Patients INNER JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.treatment_id ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, experience_years FROM doctors ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age >= 50;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY treatment_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors WHERE experience_years > 10 AND specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM treatments JOIN patients ON treatments.patient_id = patients.id WHERE patients.age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_diagnosis FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_cost > 1000;
SELECT physician_name, physician_specialty FROM Physicians WHERE physician_experience_years >= 10;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY patient_age;
SELECT physician_name, physician_specialty, physician_contact FROM Physicians WHERE physician_experience_years > 10 ORDER BY physician_name;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_cost FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_duration > 5 ORDER BY treatment_name;
SELECT * FROM Diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY diagnosis_category;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialty FROM Physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' OR specialty = 'Oncology' ORDER BY specialty;
SELECT test_name, result, test_date FROM MedicalTests WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
